title: Vane
body:
Vane


Genres/Tags: Adventure, Exploration, Third-person, 3D
Companies: Friend & Foe, Gamera Game
Languages: ENG/MULTI7
Original Size: 2.3 GB
Repack Size: 772 MB

 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehosters: Google Drive + 2 (Uploaded by Uria Urikra and hermietkreeft, compatible with torrent)
  • Filehoster: WorldSrc (NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Vane-HOODLUM ISO release: hlm-vane.iso (2,418,812,928 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all game files are identical to originals after installation
  • Bonus OST in FLAC format ripped (MP3 copy left intact), NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 2.3 GB to 772 MB)
  • Installation takes 1-3 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 2 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

In a ruined desert, a strange golden dust transforms a free-spirited bird into a determined young child, setting off a chain of events that will reshape the world itself.

Set out on an exploratory quest, transforming between bird and child, using both perspectives to unravel the land’s mysteries and create a path forward through the barren landscape. As you do so, the world reacts to your passage, evolving and building into something altogether different.

From the team at Friend & Foe Games, Vane is a stunning, emotional and unnerving experience. Developed with the conviction that players should find their own path through the world, the result is a minimalistic, stark environment that encourages exploration just to the edge of getting lost, set to an all-original brooding synth soundtrack.
